rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究凸显了儿童艾滋病毒免疫的潜力威尔康奈尔医学院的研究表明，儿童时期的艾滋病毒免疫有一天可以在青春期感染这种潜在致命感染的风险急剧增加之前提供保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-study-highlights-潜在-of-childhood-immunization-against-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-study-highlights-pottial-of-childhood-immunization-against-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb03302-1bd0-49f4-b5d3-f8182cb0e058 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 23:09:00 -0400 New study highlights potential of childhood immunization against HIV
新方法将药物发现速度从几年缩短到几个月辛辛那提大学医学院和辛辛那提儿童医院的研究人员发现了一种提高药物发现速度和成功率的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-method-accelerates-drug-discovery-from-years-to-months.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/New-method-accelerates-drug-discovery-from-years-to-months.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6820a3a2-cc5b-4ade-ba59-c03d3b2cc267 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 23:06:00 -0400 New method accelerates drug discovery from years to months
索马鲁肽可降低心血管疾病和 COVID-19 的死亡率由麻省总医院布莱根妇女医院（麻省总医院布莱根医疗保健系统的创始成员之一）的研究人员领导的一项国际研究发现，注射索马鲁肽的患者死于任何原因的可能性较小，包括心血管疾病和 COVID-19 等感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Semaglutide-cuts-death-rates-from-cardioangio-disease-and-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Semaglutide-cuts-death-rates-from-cardioangio-disease-and-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2d89469-02a3-4832-9a09-5fc6272e1524 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Semaglutide cuts death rates from cardiovascular disease and COVID-19
研究强调需要制定明确的健康补水指南充足的水摄入对于人类健康和福祉至关重要。但在世界各地，含糖饮料的消费量不断增加，加速了肥胖、2 型糖尿病、心脏病和蛀牙等健康挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Research-highlights-need-for-clear-guidelines-on-healthy-Hydration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Research-highlights-need-for-clear-guidelines-on-healthy-Hydration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ab81497-0fae-4e5d-8f5a-63811a6c53bf Fri, 30 Aug 2024 23:00:00 -0400 Research highlights need for clear guidelines on healthy hydration
Tau 蛋白在减轻脑损伤方面显示出意想不到的好处贝勒医学院和德克萨斯儿童医院 Jan and Dan Duncan 神经学研究所 (Duncan NRI) 的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，Tau 蛋白是与包括阿尔茨海默病在内的多种神经退行性疾病有关的关键蛋白，也发挥着积极作用在大脑中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Tau- Protein-shows-unexpected-benefits-in-mitigating-brain-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Tau- Protein-shows-unexpected-benefits-in-mitigating-brain-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=132e6d68-70db-4dcc-b328-831c0dccd322 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 22:57:00 -0400 Tau protein shows unexpected benefits in mitigating brain damage
尼日利亚和刚果民主共和国采取行动推出新的mpox疫苗随着非洲加强控制多国疫情的措施，尼日利亚将立即开始推出 5,000 剂 MPOX 疫苗，而刚果民主共和国 (DRC) 也计划首批运送 65,000 剂 MPOX 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Nigeria-and-DRC-take-action-with-new-mpox-vaccine-rollouts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Nigeria-and-DRC-take-action-with-new-mpox-vaccine-rollouts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65cfbc0c-8be2-44a5-91b7-c27086e62dfc Fri, 30 Aug 2024 22:54:00 -0400 Nigeria and DRC take action with new mpox vaccine rollouts
菲律宾因推出未经证实的非洲猪瘟疫苗而面临审查由于专家对其安全性和有效性表示怀疑，菲律宾正在受控地推广来自越南的未经证实的非洲猪瘟 (ASF) 疫苗，因此受到全球的密切关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Philippines-faces-scrutiny-over-rollout-of-unproven-African-swine-fever-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Philippines-faces-scrutiny-over-rollout-of-unproven-African-swine-fever-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b926c057-6210-441d-9f74-890e00a05c38 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 22:49:00 -0400 Philippines faces scrutiny over rollout of unproven African swine fever vaccine
可生物降解的诊断测试为塑料污染提供可持续的解决方案全球塑料污染危机和 COVID-19 大流行的影响（数十亿一次性诊断测试被丢弃）正在促使企业和研究人员开发新的、更可持续的快速诊断测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Biodegradable-diagnostic-tests-offer-sustainable-solution-to- Plastic-pollution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Biodegradable-diagnostic-tests-offer-sustainable-solution-to- Plastic-pollution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=637591a2-ea64-4e3c-b09d-006b35be40f8 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 22:46:00 -0400 Biodegradable diagnostic tests offer sustainable solution to plastic pollution
高温影响熊蜂嗅觉和授粉效率气候变化正在以多种不同方式影响生态系统。其后果之一是炎热期越来越长、越来越强烈，这影响了授粉等重要的自然过程。来自维尔茨堡朱利叶斯·马克西米利安大学 (JMU) 的一组研究人员现在更详细地研究了热量如何影响这些过程中的一个特定参与者：大黄蜂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/High-temporals-affect-bumblebee-sense-of-smell-and-pollination-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/High-temporals-affect-bumblebee-sense-of-smell-and-pollination-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=782c6dce-5a2c-470e-bf1f-aaff6588ea1d Fri, 30 Aug 2024 22:40:30 -0400 High temperatures affect bumblebee sense of smell and pollination efficiency
克隆造血被确定为动脉粥样硬化的新危险因素除了已知的心血管疾病危险因素——高血压、高胆固醇、糖尿病、超重和肥胖、吸烟和缺乏运动——之外，还必须添加一个新因素：克隆造血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Clonal-hematopoiesis-identified-as-new-risk-factor-for-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240830/Clonal-hematopoiesis-identified-as-new-risk-factor-for-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60e719b7-2d26-418e-8cfd-0b17cd05db15 Fri, 30 Aug 2024 22:19:07 -0400 Clonal hematopoiesis identified as new risk factor for atherosclerosis
